presentation.title: I'm Lucas Daher, passionate about technology and design.
presentation.desc: With almost a year of experience as a front-end developer and UX designer, I am always seeking new challenges and improving my skills to create amazing and functional interfaces.

skills.title: My skills

projects.title: My projects
